author: AppLovin
description: AppLovin MAX Defold Plugin for Android and iOS.
name: AppLovin MAX

releases.message:
- Depends on Android SDK [v12.2.0](https://github.com/AppLovin/AppLovin-MAX-SDK-Android/releases/tag/release_12_2_0) and iOS SDK [v12.2.0](https://github.com/AppLovin/AppLovin-MAX-SDK-iOS/releases/tag/release_12_2_0).
- Fix revenue events not being passed to the callback.

- Initial implementations for interstitials, rewarded ads, programmatic banners & MRECs. The documentation is available [here](https://dash.applovin.com/documentation/mediation/defold/getting-started/integration)
- Depends on Android SDK [v12.1.0](https://github.com/AppLovin/AppLovin-MAX-SDK-Android/releases/tag/release_12_1_0) and iOS SDK [v12.1.0](https://github.com/AppLovin/AppLovin-MAX-SDK-iOS/releases/tag/release_12_1_0).
